magpie.data.utilities.normalizers

Class IndependentVariableNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.normalizers.BaseDatasetNormalizer
      • magpie.data.utilities.normalizers.IndependentVariableNormalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RescalingNormalizer, ZScoreNormalizer

    public abstract class IndependentVariableNormalizer
extends BaseDatasetNormalizer
    Base class for normalizers that treat attributes/class independently. Implementations must supply the following functions:
    1. computeAttributeStatistics(int, double[])
    2. normalizeAttributes(double[])
    3. restoreAttributes(double[])
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • trainOnAttributes

        protected void trainOnAttributes(Dataset Data)
        Description copied from class: BaseDatasetNormalizer
        Perform the actual training work for attributes. Must establish the parameters necessary to normalize attributes and return them to their original range.
        Specified by:

      • trainOnMeasuredClass

        protected void trainOnMeasuredClass(Dataset Data)
        Description copied from class: BaseDatasetNormalizer
        Perform the actual training work for the class variable. Must establish the parameters necessary to normalize attributes and return them to their original range.

        NOTE: Use the measured class variable to train normalizer.

        Specified by:
        trainOnMeasuredClass in class BaseDatasetNormalizer
        Parameters:
        Data - Training set
